Forwarded From Air Force Commander Mykola Oleschuk?? 2 MISSILES AND 4 ATTACK UAVS SHOT DOWN On the night of August 8, 2024, the enemy hit Kharkiv region with 2 Iskander-M ballistic missiles from the Belgorod region. - Russian Federation, by 2 X-59 guided air missiles from the airspace over the Sea of ??Azov and 4 strike UAVs of the "Shahed" type from Yeisk - Russian Federation. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, the mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, anti-aircraft missile troops and EW units of the Air Force shot down two Kh-59 guided air missiles and 4 attack UAVs in the Odesa, Kherson and Kirovohrad regions.
